medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with right lower quadrant pain that began early yesterday evening. Initially described as diffuse, the pain has now localized to the right lower quadrant. The intensity of the pain is not specified. He has not had any appetite since the pain began. Denies nausea/vomiting, fevers/chills, diarrhea, constipation, blood in stools, dysuria, or recent sick contacts.
